The Fridge is an Ubuntu community driven news website. Check it out: http://fridge.ubuntu.com

== How to contribute a story ==

If you add a story or can help out with one of the tasks below, please contact us!

* IRC: #ubuntu-news on irc.libera.net, or on your browser using <nowiki>[[https://web.libera.chat/?nick=webchat?#ubuntu-news|Webchat]]</nowiki>
* Email: ubuntu-news-team@lists.ubuntu.com (no subscription necessary)

More on our <nowiki>[[Fridge-Submit|Submit News]]</nowiki> page

== Becoming an editor ==

Editors please read <nowiki>[[Fridge-EditorGuidelines|Editor Guidelines]]</nowiki>

If you want to join our team, please read the requirements at https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-fridge and apply via the ubuntu-news-team email list if you match the description
